profile.profileDescription: Moving Image Archive for the Martha Graham Foundation

label.name_singular: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC: Sorenson AVC Pro codec
label.name_plural: H.264/MPEG-4 AVC: Sorenson AVC Pro codec

label.name_singular: Direct Stream Transfer (DST): MPEG-4 DST reference software
label.name_plural: Direct Stream Transfer (DST): MPEG-4 DST reference software

label.name_singular: DTS Coherent Acoustics (DTS, Digital Theatre System Coherent Acoustics)
label.name_plural: DTS Coherent Acoustics (DTS, Digital Theatre System Coherent Acoustics)

label.name_singular: MPEG-4: Harmonic and Individual Lines and Noise (HILN)
label.name_plural: MPEG-4: Harmonic and Individual Lines and Noise (HILN)

label.name_singular: RALCWI (Robust Advanced Low Complexity Waveform Interpolation)
label.name_plural: RALCWI (Robust Advanced Low Complexity Waveform Interpolation)

label.name_singular: RTAudio - used by Microsoft Live Communication Server
label.name_plural: RTAudio - used by Microsoft Live Communication Server

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Narrative description for set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the set.

label.name: Item description
label.description: Narrative description for item in this set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the item in the context of this set.

label.name: Presentation type
label.description: Determines how set is rendered when displayed to the public in the Pawtucket/Pawtucket2 front-end.

label.name: Is primary item for set?
label.description: The item marked as primary will be used to represent the set as a whole when included in a list of sets.

label.name: Chronology element code
label.description: Element code of date range element to be used when placing set items into chronological order.

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: Alternate identifiers
label.description: List alternate identifiers here. These are alphanumeric codes used at some point to identify the object which are no longer employed.

label.name: Notes (internal use only)
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: Copyright
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: Production Duration
label.description: The running time of the production. Enter durations in any of the following formats: hh:mm:ss (hours/minutes/seconds), Xh Xm Xs (hours/minutes/seconds) or XXXs (seconds).

label.name: Duration
label.description: The running time of the moving image. Enter durations in any of the following formats: hh:mm:ss (hours/minutes/seconds), Xh Xm Xs (hours/minutes/seconds) or XXXs (seconds).

label.name: Creation dates
label.description: Date of creation for the intellectual content of the Work

label.name: Premiere date
label.description: Date the Dance was premiered.

label.name: Content Date
label.description: Date of creation for content of the Moving Image.

label.name: Date Transferred
label.description: Date the film or video was digitized.

label.name: Date Cleaned
label.description: Date the video was cleaned.

label.name: Date Cleaned
label.description: Date the video was cleaned.

label.name: Carrier - choose all that apply (multiple copies)
Encoding
label.description: Enter data here only if values are not auto-extracted from technical metadata embedded in the uploaded file.

label.name: Bit Depth
label.description: Enter data here only if values are not auto-extracted from technical metadata embedded in the uploaded file.

label.name: Sampling Rate
label.description: Enter data here only if values are not auto-extracted from technical metadata embedded in the uploaded file.
